introduction.p: This script is a shell to link to the part of Drag and Drop tests that cover this functionality.
See this test to test SideBar List Items.
The test applies to all FieldWorks item trees though it is written for the Data Entry label bar.

context.p: Many setting combinations are possible. Testing does not require exhaustive combinations of these settings, but should identify critical ones and seek reasonable coverage for others. The first words of the bug report title should be a noun phrase containing the words "Side Bar List"
